message.content:
cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.DB. 

This paper proposes a cold-start recommendation approach based on granular association rules, which involves techniques from artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information retrieval (cs.IR) to generate association rules between users and items. The approach also involves machine learning (cs.LG) to recommend items to users using these rules. Additionally, the paper discusses the appropriate setting of granule, which is a concept from fuzzy logic and could be categorized under soft computing (cs.SI) or databases (cs.DB).
